elements.name: To verify that System admin should be able to view pricing engine module on web.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin User
Click on Pricing Engine
System admin should be able to view pricing engine module on web.

elements.name: To verify that User other than System admin should not able to view pricing engine module on web.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as Super admin
User other than System admin should not able to view pricing engine module on web.

elements.name: To verify that user should be redirected to a new page for pricing engine.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin User
Click on Pricing Engine
User should be redirected to a new page for pricing engine.

elements.name: To verify that System admin should be able to add initiate service charge through Pricing engine module successfully.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin User
Click on Pricing Engine
Click on the Service Policy
Click on add new rule buttton,add New service charge and save the policy as draft

elements.name: To verify that user should also be able to make commission profile with the same pricing engine module.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin User
Click on Pricing Engine
Click on commission

steps.name: Click on commission and select the service you want to add commission profile for

elements.name: To verify that user should be able to calculate service charge using pricing calculator.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin User
Click on Pricing Engine
Click on the Search Tab & Search by Rule Name
Verify Search results should give the list of rule name with Condition,status,Validity,rule & Policytype

elements.name: To verify that user is able to view the previous versions of the policy.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin User
Click on Pricing Engine
Click on the Service Policy
Click on View Previous Version Link, Enter available Ver no and Proceed to View the details

elements.name: To verify that if the user has saved any policy as draft he should be able to view the saved draft.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin User
Click on Pricing Engine
Click on the Service Policy
Click on add new rule buttton,add New service charge and save the policy as draft
Check if user is able to view the saved draft

elements.name: To verify that user should be able to reject the policy pending for approval.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin User
Click on Pricing Engine
Click on the Service Policy

elements.name: To verify that user can easily create a duplicate service charge by clicking on the clone option from the available service charge.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin User
Click on Pricing Engine
Click on the Service Policy
Click on Existing Service Policy Rule edit and save
clone the edited Service Policy Rule with other service Policy
